edu.psu.citeseerx.corecom
Interface ConnectionPoolMonitor

public interface ConnectionPoolMonitor

Interface for listening to events in a connection pool. Classes that implement this interface should *not* register or de-register themselves with the connection pool as part of the interface methods or a thread deadlock can occur.

Method Summary
